text: INBOUND starts tomorrow! Don't forget to read through our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/the-developers-guide-to-inbound23|Developers Guide to INBOUND> and save all your top dev sessions in our <https://help.inbound.com/article/271-logging-into-app|mobile app>! I'll be keeping y'all posted about when to mosey on over to the next dev talk in this channel, as well. Rest up and get your comfy shoes on - we can't wait to see you! (also - download this handy graphic and save it to your faves for handy reference, see thread)
